articles.description: Scotland are drawn in the same group as hosts Germany at Euro 2024 while England are in Group C along with Denmark, Slovenia and Serbia.
articles.title: Scotland in same group as hosts Germany at Euro 2024

articles.description: Anthony Gordon scores the only goal as a dominant Newcastle United beat Manchester United at St James' Park.
articles.title: Gordon goal gives Newcastle win over Man Utd

articles.description: Uefa says it is investigating after sex noises were transmitted during the broadcast of the Euro 2024 draw on Saturday.
articles.title: Uefa investigates after sex noises disrupt Euros draw

articles.description: Tiger Woods says he been pleasantly surprised by his return to action after shooting a one-under par 71 in round three at the Hero World Challenge.
articles.title: Woods 'pleasantly surprised' by return from injury

articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles and San Francisco 49ers have become rivals and the 49ers will aim for revenge in Sunday's rematch of last season's NFC Championship game.
articles.title: 'Like Rocky v Apollo Creed' – NFL's newest rivalry

articles.description: Arsenal move four points clear at the top of the Premier League table with victory over Wolves at Emirates Stadium.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Wolves to move four points clear

articles.description: Kevin Durant's seventh 30-point game in a row lifts him to 10th on the NBA's all-time scoring list.
articles.title: Suns' Durant moves into all-time scoring top 10

articles.description: Chile's Joaquin Niemann defeats Japan's Rikuya Hoshino in a play-off to win the Australian Open for the first time.
articles.title: Niemann takes Australian Open with play-off victory

articles.description: Brahim Diaz and Rodrygo on target as Real Madrid win their fifth game in a row to move top of La Liga on goal difference from Girona.
articles.title: Madrid return to top of league with Granada win

articles.description: UFC president Dana White criticises a referee for failing to end a bout earlier, with the official's delayed decision angering fighters.
articles.title: UFC boss White criticises referee over 'bad stoppage'
